JobPosting.JobPostingTitle: System Administrator Specialist (MS Exchange, AD Voice))
JobPosting.Description: As our company is growing and we offer more service to our teams, we are looking for a Senior System engineer with a broad set of expertise in Messaging, voice systems, mail gateways, encryption (smime), etc.
